fields.label: Purpose
fields.description: Ensures fair, inclusive, and transparent recruitment for permanent, temporary, and seasonal positions.

fields.label: Approval for New Positions
options: Senior management must approve new roles
Each position requires a clear job description and justification

fields.label: Advertising
options: Internal advertising is prioritized
External ads must avoid discriminatory language
Clear closing dates and job-focused criteria required

fields.label: Selection Criteria
options: Based on competencies, qualifications, and experience
Preference for Previously Disadvantaged Groups (PDGs)
ID and address verification mandatory

fields.label: Non-Discrimination Principles
options: No discrimination based on race, age, gender, etc.
All applicants treated fairly and consistently

fields.label: Selection Process
options: Panel-based standardized interviews
Only job-relevant criteria used in interviews

fields.label: Job Offer
options: Offer includes job title, location, salary, responsibilities, reporting line, and start date
Acceptance deadline is included

fields.label: Seasonal Advertising
options: Posted in local high-traffic areas
Fixed application dates provided

fields.label: Seasonal Selection
options: Skills-based selection
Prior experience and attendance considered

fields.label: Induction and Training
options: Safety and role-specific induction
Policies and procedures reviewed

fields.label: Contractual Terms
options: Fixed-term contract provided
Includes duration, compensation, and eligibility for future seasons

fields.label: Recruitment Standards
options: Contractors follow transparent, fair processes
No child, forced, or bonded labour permitted
Contractors must align with legal and ethical standards

fields.label: Documentation and Verification
options: Submit payslips, ID/work permits, and detailed contracts
No worker charged for job placement
Confidential reporting system in place

fields.label: Compliance and Monitoring
options: Regular audits of labour contractors
Violations lead to corrective actions or termination

fields.label: Foreign Nationals and Work Permits
options: Must present valid work permits or residency docs
Documents verified before employment

fields.label: General Compliance
fields.description: All recruitment activities must comply with WIETA/SIZA and labor legislation.
